import React, { useState } from 'react' import Header from '../common/Header' import Footer from '../common/footer' import "./form1.css" const Form=()=> { const [user,setUser]=useState({ name:"",email:"",branch:"",explain:"",city:"",course:"",phoneno:"",resume:"" }); let name,value; const handleInputs=(e)=>{ console.log(e); name=e.target.name; value=e.target.value; setUser({...user,[name]:value} ) } return (
Please enter Your Name.
) } export default Form
